section.name: Java Persistence API Spring 2014
section.p:
This is the course content home page for the Java Persistence API course. The class
collaboration site can be used for discussions.

ul.li:
Setup development environment
Use the git "jpa-class" branch and not the "master" branch (git pull origin jpa-class)
Ignore JBoss aspects of H2 Database setup
Windows XP users, set Maven .m2/settings.xml#localRepository to c:\m2\repository or anything without spaces.

Successfully...
Build the class example tree from the command line from the root ("mvn clean install")
Imported at least one class example project into Eclipse
